summary: This is an email exchange from January 13, 2021, regarding scheduling a meeting or chat between individuals, including a Chief from the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The subject suggests the discussion is about 'Just chiefs and =, no team,' though the meaning is unclear due to possible redactions or garbled text.

persons.name: Chief
persons.role: Chief, Public Corruption Unit, U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York

events.title: Email exchange about scheduling a meeting
events.description: An email exchange occurs to coordinate a time for a chat involving the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit and other individuals, with proposed times on January 14, 15, and the following Tuesday.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an email from January 13, 2021, involving the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email discusses scheduling a chat, with availability noted for January 14 at 1 PM, January 15 at 3 PM, and the following Tuesday at 3:30 PM.
The subject line references 'Just chiefs and =, no team,' which may indicate a redacted or incomplete topic, possibly related to coordination within the office.
The correspondence suggests ongoing legal or investigative activities within the Public Corruption Unit around this time.
